lead_paragraph: The chief police investigator in the northern state of Sinaloa was killed hours after he started investigating the kidnapping of a local radio journalist, Mexican news media reported.
snippet: The chief police investigator in the northern state of Sinaloa was killed hours after he started investigating the kidnapping of a local radio journalist, Mexican news media reported.

headline.main: Mexico: Police Official Slain by Gunmen
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Police Official Slain By Gunmen
